partner_offer_block: That's not all, you can benefit from various other charges too
partner_offer_acc_openfee:
Account Opening FeeOpportunity to charge up to ₹9,999
Anything above ₹500 is 100% yours!
partner_offer_acc_maintenance_charges: Account Maintenance Charges (DP AMC)Charge up to ₹4,999 - Earn 100%
partner_offer_pledge_unpledge_charges:
Pledge, unpledge charges (MTF, Margin Pledge)Choose from our standard plans – Earn 20%
Or customise and Earn 100%
heroRightHeading: Opening for 1,000 partners on an invite-only basis
advantageSubHeading: Partnering with us has a lot of advantages for your business. See, what's in it for you.
advantageH1_1: Create customised brokerage plans as a one-time activity, for all future onboarding of your clients. Choose from Discount, Traditional or Hybrid models. Customise interest rates, DP charges and more, for your clients' varied needs and maximise your earnings.
advantageH2: Run your business through interactive dashboard
advantageH2_2: Onboard your clients in a few clicks
advantageH2_3: Customise brokerage plans as per guide client's trading behaviour
advantageH2_4: View & monitor client's portfolio and LIVE positions
advantageH2_6: Dedicated BA excellence desk - online and offline support
advantageH3_2: on their behalf and share link with them only for documentation
advantageH3_4:
with your clients and let
them do it themselves
advantageH3_6:
and get multiple clients onboarded
in one go
advantageH4_1: with 25+ years of experience across 19 countries
advantageH5_1: with best brokerages and interest rate plans
advantageH6_1: with zero disparity irrespective of your business size
advantageH8_1: with visibility on clients app and web trading platforms
clientTitle2: Range of products on a single platform
tagline: Also, get sharing across 8 more revenue streams including Interest charges, DP charges, Account opening fee and more.
viewDetailedTitle: View detailed pricing and payout details

Brokerage Plan₹0 to ₹9,999100% above ₹500NA
pricingTable_Income_Acc_note:
*It’s an annual recurring fee (applicable from second year onwards),which you can charge to those clients whom you are offering the ‘Zero brokerage account’, since you won’t earn any brokerage income from them. The partner service fee will be equal to the account opening fee that you charge your client and 100% of that will be yours.

Note: Mirae Asset will debit a flat fee of ₹500 for every new client onboarded, regardless of the account opening fee chosen
pricingTable_Income_Brokerage_disc: You can either select from our standard plans or create a customised plan for your clients based on their differentiated needs and trading behaviour.

pricingTable_Income_dp_tranchar_disc: You can either select from our standard DP sell transaction charge of ₹12 per ISIN or customise client’s DP Sell transaction charges from ₹12 to ₹25 and earn 100% payout.
pricingTable_DP_incone_delaychar: Income from Delayed Payment Charges & Operating Charges
pricingTable_DP_incone_delaychar_disc: Earn flat 20% income sharing from DPC interest earned on client’s negative ledger balance and on Operating Charges.
